response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our exclusive product, which holds immense value to us at $1,000,000. Considering its significance and the potential it holds for you, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special price of $950,000. This is an exceptional chance to secure a high-quality asset at a premium yet competitive rate. Should you have any questions or wish to proceed, please let me know promptly. I look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 950000}
